title: 16C.18 REPORTS.
text:
[Repealed, 1Sp2003 c 8 art 1 s 13]
[Repealed, 2007 c 135 art 2 s 40]
The commissioner of transportation, and each metropolitan agency listed in section 473.143, subdivision 1, shall report to the commissioner of administration all information that the commissioner requests to make reports required under this section. The information must be reported at the time and in the manner requested by the commissioner of administration.
